reviews.review: Uma obra-prima da Valve com jogabilidade revolucionária para a época. "Agora eu posso dizer que estou pensando com portais!"

So obviously Portal 2 has a great story line and is a long game making this game seem like the test it is. This game is still great and recommend it to everyone considering you can buy it in a bundle with Portal and Portal 2 for really cheap. I played Portal 2 first and played Portal years later because I thought this game was really bad compared to Portal 2 I am now realizing this game is great and to anyone wanting to play Portal and Portal 2 I recommend playing them in order unlike me. The Portal games are some of the best games in gaming history and you've probably heard that before this game has extremely high praise for a good reason, good puzzle design for new players, great story design, great characters. To anyone who has seen only the Trailer to this game you would just think "Oh just another puzzle game". But this game is a complete ice berg this game tells so much story about the world you play in to where they somehow captured what a game is meant to be to anyone who thinks games are bad and should be banned need to play these games. These games bring so much to gaming even though there over 10 years old at this point there still being played I hope they will keep being played until the end of time these games are actually the best games despite there normal looking game it has so much more. I could keep going on why this game is good but i'll stop right here if you haven't played this game or somehow NEVER played just buy them I can 100% confirm you will have a good time and laugh.
a true classic. worth the time, even if you're not into puzzle games!
Gran jugabilidad, dificultad y trama escondida

Jogo muito bom, apesar de ser curto, terá momentos em que sua cachola vai fumaçar de tanto pensar, Até que uma hora vai bater a brisa do conhecimento e vai dar de boa!
Recomendo!.

Have owned this for a while, but recently finished the campaign again. It's one of my favorite first person puzzled based adventure games, and still holds up well after all these years.

I loved this game and the only problem is the 10 seconds between some chambers becuase I cant wait to get to the next one. Id say this game should be $7.50 instead of $10 but you should really get it before Portal 2       
which I think should be a $40 game. The $15s for both special is a total steal foe these really fun games!

A classic among Valve's games, in fact I associate GLaDOS with Valve's envisionment regarding the way futuristic game characters are going to evolve like. Still relevant to this day, an inspiration for many franchises/stand-alone games. I recommend playing Portal 1 before proceeding to the second game as it is strongly linked to the events from the first game and the Half Life anthology as well.
Super fun puzzles. Humorous story line.
Awsome game, interesting mechanics and nice story.

This game is amazing for some mind blowing puzzles to solve where you will be tested in arena with the help of using portals. 

Pros
+ Mechanics
+ Physics
+ Story telling
+ Portal Gun
+ Puzzles and Level Designs

Cons
- Few levels especially at the end might bother your brain to get the ideas
